array.string:
<b:t>Annie is a great baby-sitter. She makes</b:t> <b:ot tag="a"> £6.50</b:ot> <b:t>an hour. Dava is an even better baby-sitter. She makes</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">2 and a half</b:ot> <b:t>times more than Annie per hour.</b:t>
<b:t>How much does Dava make per hour?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">2 1/2</b:ot> <b:op op="*" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">£6.50</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot tag="c" b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="13">13</b:ot>

<b:t>How much more does Dava make than Annie per hour?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">£13</b:ot> <b:op op="-" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">£6.50</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="6.50">£6.50</b:ot>

<b:t>How many hours does Annie need to baby-sit before she can equal Dava's pay for </b:t> <b:ot tag="d">two</b:ot> <b:t> hours of baby-sitting?</b:t>
<b:t>Dava earns</b:t> <b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">13</b:ot> <b:op op="*" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">2</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot tag="e" b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="26">26</b:ot> <b:t>in two hours</b:t>

<b:t>Annie needs to baby-sit</b:t> <b:ot tag="e" enabled="no">26 hours</b:ot> <b:op op="/" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">£6.50</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> < b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="4">4</b:ot>
